DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of bimatoprost 0.03% formulation B ophthalmic solution with LUMIGANÂ® (bimatoprost ophthalmic solution 0.03%) once daily for 12 weeks in patients with glaucoma or ocular hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Different Formulations of Bimatoprost Ophthalmic Solution in Patients With Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Patient has ocular hypertension or glaucoma in both eyes Requires IOPlowering therapy in each eye Active or recurrent eye disease that would interfere with interpretation of study data in either eye History of any eye surgery or laser in either eye within 6 months Required chronic use of other eye medications during the study Anticipated wearing of contact lenses during the study. Intermittent use of oral, intramuscular, or intravenous corticosteroids within 21 days
